nodes.text: The Battle Horn-class bulk cruiser was a model of bulk cruiser manufactured by Rendili StarDrive, and was named for the Battle Horn, a famous Rendili ship that served the New Republic. When Dean Jinzler was suggesting a list of ships the group of survivors of the Outbound Flight Project could use to leave the planetoid on The Redoubt, he suggested a Battle Horn-class ship, but Brace Tarkosa and Chas Uliar turned it down.
